website_summaries.verdict: A compact, affordable option that utilizes coffee pods. A perfect option for dorm rooms or those with small kitchens.
pros: Lightweight and conveniently sized for travel and small spaces
Works well with K-Cup pods and brews very hot coffee
Easy to store if needed and simple to use
Shuts off automatically when not in use
Priced competitively and backed by a 2-year warranty
cons: Not all cups will fit under the machine and the small reservoir needs to be refilled often

customer_reviews.title: In love with my Aicok
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm in love with this little machine. It replaces a Breville Kcup machine that lasted about 4 years. Never got a really hot cup of coffee out of the Breville and no matter what kind of coffee I used, it always tasted weak. Not anymore with my Aicok. I'm VERY happy. Coffee is HOT and delicious. I hope it lasts for a long time. Ps: Never heard of this brand before, but took the chance because of the reviews. People, lets keep giving unbiased feedback on our purchases. We need to support those companies who are doing well their jobs. UPDATE: Still in love with my Aicok coffee machine.
customer_reviews.author: Juan O. Rivera Algarin

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy use in motorhome!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I've had 2 Kurigs and they both quit working after a year. I decided to go for something compact and inexpensive for our motorhome travels and this was a good buy! My husband and I make at least 6 cups of coffee a day in it and have had it for 5 months now. It works great and the coffee tastes good. I also like that it uses all the water you put in it for each cup so the water tank doesn't get gross. Highly recommend. Just be sure you press your kcup into the holder so it pops in before you close the lid to brew.
customer_reviews.author: BellaBean

customer_reviews.title: First one did not work. After notifying Aicok about ...
customer_reviews.text: First one did not work. After notifying Aicok about this issue, we immediately received a second machine and it has been working properly! We are enjoying our hot cocoa k-cups! Thank you!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this thing, save yourself some grief and buy real Keurig. The one I purchased leaks like crazy from the bottom, lesson learned. Update: The pump motor eventually failed as well and the unit was thrown in the trash. The seller contacted my by e-mail a few weeks ago via e-mail and eventually refunded my money despite the coffee maker not being available for return. Very ethical seller, but still a terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: P T M

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it. Read reviews for Keurig brand and was less than impressed by the longevity considering the least expensive is still twice as much as the Aicok. Although it isnt as sleek as a keurig it works great, no problems. Probably 60 k cups have been used in it so far and it still works perfectly. Easy to use and clean, not very large and could be stored relatively easy. Takes 2-3 minutes per cup.
customer_reviews.author: electronics guru

customer_reviews.title: I really like the coffee maker but it's currently not pulling all ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the coffee maker but it's currently not pulling all the water to make a cup of coffee. It's also pulling grounds out of the k cup more often. Not sure what is going on but it is a great Machine for what it is. Hope it fixes itself or Aicok contacts me for assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Jmuth01

customer_reviews.title: 2016 to use for traveling and primarily in our RV and LOVED it. Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Well, we received this coffee maker in October, 2016 to use for traveling and primarily in our RV and LOVED it. Worked great, exactly as advertised. Then, last week after 6 months of use a huge POOF of steam, coffee ran out the bottom, and it's now dead. I wrote the company through Amazon's Customer Service link over a week ago (supposed to take 2-3 days to respond) and not a word. Edit May 8, 2017: The company shipped a brand new coffee maker which arrived today. It works great. Hopefully this one will last as we do love this machine. Customer Service was very pleasant and sent the new maker right away.
customer_reviews.author: D Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Coffee Maker...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this coffee maker for a few months... we love it! It's small, easy to use, and easy to clean. If you're a coffee drinker, I definitely recommend this little machine! I also bought these to use in it for our regular ground coffee...... they work good.
customer_reviews.author: Mammy

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP CRAP.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a back up for my Keurig in case anything happened, My Keurig died so I had this little coffee pot ready to go and after one day and one cup of coffered it quit working. If I could give it 1/2 a star I would. CHEAP CRAP.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this maker for quite a while....still going strong! Makes a good cup of coffeee....especially when I use the new fangled biodegradable k cups. Works well with reusable k cups....fill them almost completely and coffee comes out great! Update: In mid-November, I began having issues with the maker shutting off before brewing is complete, and having to push the button several times to finish....the coffee would be weak. I see this coffee maker is no longer available...so glad I purchased the Square Trade warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my old Keurig!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the size of this coffee maker. It is basically the same size as my electric tea kettle and fits very well on my counter and under my top cabinets. I also like that the water is not sitting in the reservoir growing mold, etc. - you add water with each use. I had a problem after using the coffee maker a few times, and Aicok was great about cheerfully sending me a replacement. Great customer service like that is hard to find and is certainly to be applauded. It made a great cup of piping hot coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than a year...sad.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this little coffee maker but, sadly, hope was not enough to keep this guy going. Just eight short months after purchasing, it has stopped working. I was using it in my office to make one cup of coffee in the morning - not a heavy workload for sure. Today it simply gave up the ghost and now I have to be all old-school on this cold winter day and go stand in line at Dunkin' Donuts like the rest of New England. So sad. Anyway, invest in a more reliable brand (you "K"now the one I'm referring to) and save yourself the hassle and the money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Embardo

customer_reviews.title: Look for a better coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: When it was working it was a nice little coffee maker. I have been limping along with it for several months now, after an initial problem free period of only about 6 months. I have cleaned it several times with vinegar to try to get the water to flow into the top, and i still have to “stir” it with my finger to get it to go into the water reservoir. Now, the water is not brewing into the cup fully. I have to press the button about 4 times, to have it pour for 4 cycles, to get a full cup of coffee. I’m researching other brands, so I can have a hassle free cup of morning coffee again.
customer_reviews.author: TOC

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Gift for a Coffee Lover
customer_reviews.text: It used to be that, when we went on a road trip - I knew would miss my favorite kind of coffee, until we returned home. I bought this before we spent a week at a condo with friends, in Florida. I told everyone to bring their favorite K-cups. This little coffeemaker was a real hit. My initial concern was that, without a reservoir, it would take an inordinate amount of time/per cup. Not so! It was fast and the brew was hot and delicious. I highly recommend it for anyone who travels - or would enjoy the convenience at their desk. It's lightweight and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: TaxLady

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I actually think this is great! I was pretty skeptical of buying an off brand k-cup brewer, but it works well. I wanted a k-cup brewer for my camper, but felt silly spending $100 on a little keurig that I'll only use occasionally so I ordered this and I'm impressed. It's really easy to use, and the coffee was hot! I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kdmt1970

customer_reviews.title: Nice but wish it would make coffee a bit hotter
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Aicok single serve coffee maker. I really liked the prior version of this one. The prior version seemed to make coffee a bit hotter than this new one. I did not use a thermometer to check, but it seems this way to me. Having said this, I still like this coffee maker ok - for its simplicity and it seems durable. If the manufacturer makes a new version I hope they offer a temperature control even if it costs a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: DWR

customer_reviews.title: Fits our RV use needs.
customer_reviews.text: Found this to be priced right and works very very well. First time i've purchased one of these cup type coffee makers, and we need one to keep in the RV, for single cup use. Fits our needs perfectly. Takes just a couple minutes to brew a very nice cup of coffee. Better than messing with grounds and filters in our small space and much less fuss and muss. However, these k-cups are quite expensive, so, decide if the convenience is worth the cost. This one works well, and costs less than the more expensive brand coffemaker single use.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Fenner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good machine to replace my Kuerig that stopped working. This brewer had very good reviews and a great price so I ordered one. This coffee maker is compact in size and seems to have a strong water pump. I have tried 3 different kinds of kcups and all of them left coffee grounds in the bottom of my cup. The punched hole in the bottom of the kcup is larger than what my Kuerig made so I think that is how the coffee grounds are falling into the cup. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Love this little machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine. I'm not a coffee drinker, but do like hot tea and cocoa, and wanted to try this before buying a more expensive model. This did the trick. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great little K cup brewer!
customer_reviews.text: We just had the chance to use our Travel size K cup brewer on vacation and I must say it worked flawlessly. We really like it a lot. For the money it cannot be beat. It takes about 2-3 min for it to heat water then brew but that's ok with me. It's half the cost of the competition and does the job just as good without any problems at all. I DEFINITLEY recommend this brewer especially if you are traveling and need a small brewer or using it at the office. It's perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: When traveling I would wish I had my Keurig so I could make a cup of my coffee or tea. When I discovered this I was so excited. It is perfect. It fits well in a suitcase and since I bring my own pods, I don't have to rely on the cleaning service to restock my room with their coffee. I still use their coffeemaker first thing in the morning but throughout the day or at night it is really nice to have my own whenever I want it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Gaubert

customer_reviews.title: Small and simple
customer_reviews.text: Finally used this product. Works great. Of course you need to have k cups that you know you like. I don’t bother with the motel makers anymore. They’re always weak tasting and cleanliness is always suspect. 5 stars for quality, but since its best use is as a travel coffee maker, and marketed as such, I’m giving it 4 stars because it should come with some kind of bag or case. Nothing elaborate.
customer_reviews.author: Old Smoke

customer_reviews.title: Nice little coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use when visiting my out-of-town daughter. I have used it several times now. It is simple to use and does a great job. Since I leave it at her house when I return home, it is nice that it is small and takes up very little storage space.
customer_reviews.author: E. T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this k cup maker!
customer_reviews.text: My mom wanted a k cup maker so I started researching. Keurig's are rather pricey. Saw this brand and it seemed to get good reviews, so I ordered her one. It's a wonderful single k cup maker. I was so impressed, I bought another for myself. I love that you pour in a coffee cup's worth of water, it makes the cup of coffee, and then shuts off. No extra water left in the tank. Takes a few minutes to heat the water and make a cup, but so what?
customer_reviews.author: Bazinga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it a few times but like it better than my K 2.0. Rather than try to get a touch display to repond I just pour in the amount of water I want for the cup I want to make and turn it on. Light and compact. If it is durable I will be totally happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W. Benefield

customer_reviews.title: Grumpy without coffee!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Travel to Vegas a lot and as everyone knows, they want you on the floor gambling and spending money, not sitting in the room drinking coffee. This is compact enough to bit nicely in my carry on or checked bag. I have friends who don't drink coffee, no big deal, I bring my own pot and k-cups and never miss a beat.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Travels

customer_reviews.title: LOVE/HATE.  Problem with coffee grounds
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a keurig but decided to buy much cheaper. I have absolutely loved this coffee machine, until today. I have had it for 1 month now. It makes VERY hot coffee, and takes a few minutes to make (I start it first, so it's ready about the same time that I'm finished cooking my breakfast). I love the "single serve" you get out as much water as you put into it. BUT this morning, I take a sip of coffee and get a mouth full of grounds! The Pod (which is usually still full of grounds) was completely empty. I have tried it a few times, with the same nasty results.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Brews coffee without issue for my wife. I use ...
customer_reviews.text: Brews coffee without issue for my wife. I use it to heat water for tea. We use it in our RV with an inverter, as most campgrounds do not allow generator use until 10:00am. The 800 watt power usage was an important factor because we are limited on power using a 1500 watt inverter. The unit draws about 70 amps while brewing, if that is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: alpenlite

customer_reviews.title: great service
customer_reviews.text: This item has worked very well for me.after a year and half it gave up just quit.Called the warranty number gave them a description of the problem the next day recieved a e mail requesting a little more information .shortly there after received second e mail stating they were replacing the unit. the next day received a new item. very good service. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Paul bec

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Keurig
customer_reviews.text: I don't get the negative reviews. This is as good or better than a Keurig( which last about a yr yr n 1/2). No issues. Cup of coffee in 3 mins. 1 person wrote she kept getting grounds. That has happened to me w this and my Keurig. It's not the machine it's the k cup some are defective or flimsy esp the cheaper brands
customer_reviews.author: D2

customer_reviews.title: I bought this coffeemaker 4 months ago. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffeemaker 4 months ago. It is now not working. It heats the water but won't disperse the water to the K Cup. I am happy to say that vendor is going to issue me a refund. I don't even have to return the pot. Very satisfied with their service.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great Single Serve Coffee Maker at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this single use coffee maker. You have to fill it with water before each use, but that means that there is no stale water in the unit. It makes a good hot cup of coffee. I have used both K-cups and a re-useable K-cup -- just be sure to get a re-usable K-cup that has a shallow top or it will not be possible to lock the unit for brewing.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for four months
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine but short lifespan . Seems like the pump quit working water heats up but will only pump out a small amount . Should last longer !!! Disappointed !! Updated ,great customer service sent me a replacement at no charge will give it another try. Offered a replacement with out me asking
customer_reviews.author: P. Bulmer

customer_reviews.title: Only Lasts a Month!
customer_reviews.text: I should of trusted other reviews that warned of it's short life. We loved this coffee maker at purchase (March 2017), it worked great! But, after a month, we too had the common issue of the machine having a complete failure. It still heats up the water but will not pump it through the machine. This is my first and only review of a product on Amazon because I have never had a product have such a short life...Think twice and read reviews from people who have bought and used the product for more than a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Best single k-cup brewer I've found
customer_reviews.text: Best single k-cup brewer I've found. There are cheaper versions but this one has the wider opening for filling water. Brews under pressure which I think enhances the flavor. beats Keurig and the cheap alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a coffeemaker that I could use at work but was small enough to take with me when I travel. This coffeemaker is able to do both and I am extremely happy with this product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ching

customer_reviews.title: I have used only three times and I do like it! The coffee tastes great and clean up ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used only three times and I do like it! The coffee tastes great and clean up is a snap. Bought for our camper but may keep in house! Better coffee than the big K-cup I have. Glad I chose this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I like it just as well as my past coffee makers ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this small coffee maker for my office. It was purchased to replace the two name brand that I had in the past. It works perfectly well for single cups brewed in small areas. I like it just as well as my past coffee makers but paid less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: ndmbell

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I have tried four different k-cup bands and none work without grounds getting into my coffee. The seal on top of all four brands of k-cups that I have tried leaks during the brewing process and allow grounds to get into the coffee. When you call the company support you get a recording to leave a message. When you try to leave a message a recording tells you the message box is full and not able to take more message at this time. Do not waste your money on this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a companion to our regular coffee maker. We really need both types and this is the perfect size to fit beside another pot on the counter. Doesn't take up much space but does a perfect job! The new Keurigs only use K Cup brand cups, I like several types, so this is great. We like to travel and this is light and small enough to take with. Great little machine! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Brews fast and hot, have had no issues with it so far. It fits a standard coffee mug or to go cup fine. It would be nice if it fit taller coffee tumblers, but for the price that's asking a bit much. A great value and excellent brewing machine.
customer_reviews.author: JeterJ

customer_reviews.title: Small but heavy duty kcup machine
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this small size coffee maker!!! It really make a strong cup and high temp coffee for dark brewing. It's holding up extremely well and seems sturdy and heavy duty!!! I love that it's not big like a keurig!
customer_reviews.author: kellyjlo

customer_reviews.title: 7 months later - great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great little product! I've had it for about 7 months and use it almost every day and it still works great! I mostly use reuseable pods with it, but it's worked with every kind of k-cup I've tried so far. Of course it isn't as nice as a keurig, but I'm very happy with it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Aicok Travel Size K Cup Coffeemaker while on vacation - it arrived the next day, and served well the entire week. It's perfect for travel, but can be used daily as well. I plan to take it whenever I travel - it's about the smallest size you could hope for, and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to travel with as I am a K cup fanatic and hate the hotel room coffee makers. I have used it on 3 road trips to date, and it works as well as my expensive Keurig. Planning on packing it in my checked baggage for an upcoming trip, very compact and light weight. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ShoeLady

customer_reviews.title: This is MUCH better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is MUCH better than I expected. The unit seems to made with quality. There is no flimsy plastic. It takes about 3 minutes to brew one cup and that is fine with me. No stale water reservoir. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Matheaus

customer_reviews.title: Need better contact info for a return on a defective product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product until 6 weeks after using it just once a day, it started filling my cup up with coffee grounds. I tried emailing the Aicok company at support@aicok.com but it keeps coming back to me saying user unknown. Is there another way to contact them?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Maker Leaks
customer_reviews.text: If you pour water in the K-cup area (approx 3/4 full) to rinse it out, water runs out the bottom of the coffee maker. I bought two of these coffee makers and both of them had the same issue. Note: both coffee maker will leak every time this is done. If you pour about a 1/4" of water in the K-cup area the coffee maker does not leak. There are no visible cracks in the K-cup area. I would assume there is either a manufacturing issue or a design flaw with the coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: LikeToHike

customer_reviews.title: Great for the dorm room
customer_reviews.text: Great little coffeemaker for the dorm. Bought this for my daughter to use in college. She's able to keep it in her dorm room and have a morning cup of coffee before getting dressed and going out to face the day in college and/or work. Works for both her and her roommate (she just has to buy her own K-cups!
customer_reviews.author: LishyLou

customer_reviews.title: I used this 10 or 12 times and it stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this 10 or 12 times and it stopped heating the water and only pumped out a few drops of water .. So I threw it into the trash and bought a REAL coffee maker
customer_reviews.author: Howard P.

customer_reviews.title: I love my little coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I love my little coffee maker!! It is a no frills, perfect cup everytme coffee maker. Just put in the water, add the coffee pod, push the button and walk away.....three minutes later a cup of hot coffee is ready. This company seems to really care about their customers as well. Checked in after the sale to make sure everything was satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: guitarzan

customer_reviews.title: I like this little coffee maker so well
customer_reviews.text: I like this little coffee maker so well, this is my 2nd purchase! Now I have one to take with me when I travel. You can't beat the price and makes a great cup of coffee. All K cups that I've purchased work great. Great product Aicok!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those of us that bought a keurig amd ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those of us that bought a keurig and it only gives you half of your water back that you pour in!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Romero

customer_reviews.title: I bought this 2 months ago and loved that it was producing hot coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 months ago and loved that it was producing hot coffee, hotter than Keurig. But now every time I use it, coffee leaks out the bottom of the unit. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B

customer_reviews.title: Not bad..
customer_reviews.text: My product purchased on August 27, 2017 stopped working. How do I access warranty information. The site says to contact seller but this seems to be the only available venue to do so. Overall, the product has been convenient and easy to use for the price. However, I am disappointed at the 6 mo. life span.
customer_reviews.author: nenaleann

customer_reviews.title: so good! It's very simple to use
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! It's very simple to use... even my wife who doesn't drink coffee can use it! Also, great for the price! The single cup Keurig that I had (which crapped the bed after a year), was much more complex and annoying to use than this... and it did the same thing... brewed a SINGLE cup of coffee! Hopefully this lasts a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Widdowson

customer_reviews.title: Great little coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coffeemaker for the camper because of its size and the fact that I could use the k-cups I already have with my Keurig. I am very pleased. It does take about three minutes per cup but even I can wait that long. Also, every cup starts with fresh water. It has gone on two trips which equates to several cups of coffee and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable K-Cup Coffeemaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great Portable K-Cup Coffeemaker! Not sure what else you could ask for, simple to use and extremely portable. I know some people complain that it is slow but it is nothing to get excited about, especially for the price of this unit. So if you are looking for a small portable k-cup coffee maker this is the one to get!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: I tried out the coffeemaker at home a few times to make sure it worked. Since we both wanted a cup, I added extra water in the funnel area. It handled 16 oz with no problems. The coffee seems to come out hotter than our home Kuerig maker, but it doesn't change the flavor. We used the coffeemaker on our last road trip and are very happy with the results. I think it brews faster than the hotel drip makers. It's extremely easy to use and light-weight to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple times so far. Works beautifully and is easy to conceal in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Everytime
customer_reviews.text: I love this one cup coffee maker. It is my best friend for home or traveling! I've had this Aiock for two years and it still performs with efficiency and accuracy every single cup! I can use any k cups on the market and the spills and clean up are hardly any! The water stays hot therefore your cofee stays hot! The price is amazing and I'm so thankful that I have it!
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: The coffee maker is really nice when it works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friends house warming gift 2 months ago. She has experienced several times now that the water runs out of the bottom of the unit and the K-cup stays dry. Wet counter and no coffee. The coffee maker is really nice when it works! It's convenient and doesn't take much counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: water pump fails to pump out all the water
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to fit exactly in our appliance barn in an RV. It is great for single servings and really makes a great cup of coffee if you can get all the water in and pump out. It could be "user error" but we have tried cleaning and everything we know. Still water everywhere except in the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is perfect for traveling. It fit nicely into my suitcase and came through the baggage handling without any damage! I especially liked the fact that once your cup of coffee is brewed it automatically shuts off and there is no water left inside to get stagnant. Yes, it's a little noisier and a little slower than my Keurig brewer but not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hennig

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: Product was fair quit working after a year or so. Seller was great backed the product with a refund. I( will buy fro this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Nelken

customer_reviews.title: Great for campers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in our camper. It works just fine. Very small so takes little space in the cabinet. Takes a little while to heat up but I am not in a hurry. I recommend it if you only want one or two cups made or if you have limited space.
customer_reviews.author: George T. Landrum

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work from the time it came out of the box. Spend a little more and get something nicer that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffeemaker for one
customer_reviews.text: The Aicok Single Serve Coffee Maker works very well. Add water to top, put in k-cup, push button. Takes a few minutes for the water to heat up but one it starts brewing brews very quickly. Good thing to know is that a tall travel mug dpes not fit under the dispenser. Other than that, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Skevington

customer_reviews.title: Still has problems
customer_reviews.text: This machine doesn't dispense all the water that's put into it. Only about 2/3 of the water comes out hot. I've had this problem with an older model of this brand. It was promised that this model was improved and problem free. Not true for the one I got. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: last only a little over a year!
customer_reviews.text: I've loved this coffee maker. I've kept it clean, using vinegar on occasion to clean water deposits. This week it began to choke up when I added water, smaller and smaller cups of coffee come out of it. What am I to think? Turning it upside down, lots of water drains out of several places instead of the water chamber. Doesn't last!
customer_reviews.author: gaminator

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for Christmas and she loves it. She didn’t want to pay the higher price for a more known brand name. If you want a simple one cup Kcup coffee maker, look no further. Only challenge is pouring the water into it, but it’s not the coffee maker’s fault...it’s just really hard to poor water out of a coffee cup.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised but rather difficult to pour in water without making a little of a mess
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beardslee

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: We have a bigger K cup machine but it is a bit sensitive on type of capsule used. This small Travel version works get and is idea for my office machine. It delivers a plenty hot coffee in reasonable time
customer_reviews.author: Tyro

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this unit mindful of some of the bad reviews, but at this price point I figured ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit mindful of some of the bad reviews, but at this price point I figured I would give it a try. Came in double packaged with another order of K-Cups that I ordered, no damage to any of the packing. Plugged the unit in and filled with water, no leaks or issues. Water came out hot and made a great cup of coffee. The brew time is 3 minutes, some people seem to think that is a long time to wait, but for me it is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellewnt Value
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my year-old dead Keurig with this. Smaller footprint, does the job and so far so good after several months. If it broke now, I'd buy another one. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: I returned this product
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different brands of k-cups and ended up with a cup of grounds. This company definitely needs to redesign this product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Goldenstein

customer_reviews.title: so good! Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Update now that I've had thisbfor a while. Easy to use, and works well. You have to push the button firmly. I am very happy. For a great price, it does what it is supposed to do. No need to buy an expensive keurig for a 2 person office. And it's small, which is really a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: Carla G.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little thing this is
customer_reviews.text: Well, sadly after only a few months this little guy stopped working completely. It makes the brewing noises and tries to dispense the water, but nothing comes out. There's no leak, and I've tried descaling the inside multiple times now to no avail. Look elsewhere for something long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked once and broke.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself for Christmas. We don't drink coffee but my kids like hot chocolate sometimes. Worked good the first time. Second time the liquid came out of the bottom. Third time...there was no third time it stopped working. Returned will not get another.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Provence

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the K-cup cappuccino that this produces. Great buy for her.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Goodbyte

customer_reviews.title: Short.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty decent, but some stuff doesn't fit that I got for a previously owned Keurig. Also, it's very low, so only a cup will fit. A normal sized travel mug will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this coffee maker at work and absolutely love it. We had another that broke after three ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this coffee maker at work and absolutely love it. We had another that broke after three years of multiple daily uses. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: great little k-cup maker.
customer_reviews.text: this is a great little coffee maker. I don't drink a lot of coffee, but when I want a cup, I don't have to make a whole pot. It is small and compact so it doesn't take up much space. I am getting these for my grandchildren for hot chocolate making this winter (better than using a microwave) - easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S. Foy

customer_reviews.title: A Great value and it makes a great cup of joe!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS LITTLE CHAMP!! I think I will buy another one to go in my camper :)
customer_reviews.author: Lesley E Orcutt

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Coffee hot
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Coffee hot. Just do not like how to pour in the water. Will overflow if you accidentally get water in the front part of the reservoir. However, I just use a measuring cup w/a spout for better aim.
customer_reviews.author: B. A.

customer_reviews.title: Bit the dust
customer_reviews.text: Have had coffee maker since September and it quit brewing. It will heat the water but not brew. Has had good reviews, so I thought it was safe to buy. Very disappointed. Also very loud when it used to brew
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3-4 uses.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for visits to family who do not have coffee makers and vacations. We have used it maybe 3-4 times over the last year and it heats water by will not push the water through and out so it is now usesless. So frustrating to spend $38 on a product that was used a small amount of time and now we cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: sami

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Hot coffee in about 3 minutes
customer_reviews.text: For a very simple single serve coffee machine, I like it. Hot coffee in about 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: bmac

customer_reviews.title: No muss No fuss.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It is so easy to use. Easy to clean. Heats water for tea and hot chocolate as well. Makes a great cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2, only 1 would power on.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these after my Keurig died. Upon arrival one worked and the other one wouldn’t even power on. The working coffee maker was great, but the other one went back.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Joe

customer_reviews.title: I love this little machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. It's compact and works great. I travel allot f I really trips to Vegas. Many Vegas hotels don't have coffee makers anymore. They have Starbucks in the lobby at $6 a cup. I drink at least 4 cups a day. This fits right on my carry in or checked in luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia B. Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Liked it a lot but it started leaking from the base after, maybe, 6 months use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boegel

customer_reviews.title: Aftermarket K cups don't fit well. Haven't tried the ...
customer_reviews.text: Aftermarket K cups don't fit well. Haven't tried the actual K cup. I have a reusable K cup that I use with my own coffee. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little coffee maker. I bought it specifically for travel and have it in a shoe bag. The only downside, and it's very minor, is the time it takes to heat the water @ 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working after about a year
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about a year, then water just stopped coming out of it. I don't know man.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Great for motor home use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the coffeemaker for my motor home, because I liked the reviews and the physical size. We used it on or month long trip and found it to work perfectly. It heated the water quickly and makes a good K-Cup style of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great, and simple. Coffee in 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Better than Keurig styles, no internal water storage tank, does not require the periodic cleaning, does not plug up like my Keruig..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had it for a few months. Makes a decent ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few months. Makes a decent K-cup of coffee without the high priced machine. It is very simple, so less to go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Great little compact travel coffeemaker as a very fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this coffeemaker for about 3 weeks and I'm very pleased. You can enjoy a great, hot cup of coffee in just a minute or so, If it continues to operate over the long haul I'll be extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grounds Galore!
customer_reviews.text: Puts most of the grounds in my coffee cup. Not a good brewer at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sampolesi

product_meta.title: Aicok Single Serve Coffee Maker, Single Cup Travel Coffee Brewer with One-Touch Button for Most Single Cup Pods including K-CUP pods, Quick Brew Technology, 800W, Black
feature_bullets: ✔ SINGLE CUP DESIGN WITH QUICK BREW TECHNOLOGY - Compatible for most single cup pods, including Realcups, k-cup pods,etc.And also can work with reusable k cup coffee filter.You can brews a fresh cup of coffee in only three minutes.

✔ UPGRADED INTERNAL STRUCTURE - Wider water tank mouth of this single cup coffee maker, more convenient to fill water and clean. Removable drip tray and 12 oz water reservoir support more coffee in standard-size cups or 5 1/2-inch tall large mugs at most.
✔ LIGHT-WEIGHT AND PERFECT FOR TRAVELLING - Light weight and compact design of this single serve coffee maker makes it perfect for your desk at home or work, and small enough for travelling.
✔ AUTO SHUTOFF - Smart and simple one - touch button with light indicating coffee is brewing, shuts off automatically when brewing cycle is finished, for safety and energy efficiency.

✔ 2 YEAR WARRANTY - BPA free material for water tank and UL certification, give you a powerful safety guarantee. Note: Please brew water to clean the water tank for the first use every morning, it can be more effective to extract crema from coffee.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars826 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
